de.geofencing.event.mail

Class MailDBConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.geofencing.event.mail.MailDBConnector

  • public class MailDBConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods to execute CRUD-operations for mail addresses on the MongoDB
    Author:
    Markus Thral

      • MailDBConnector

    • Method Detail

      • addAddressOnHold

        public static boolean addAddressOnHold(java.lang.String recipient)
                                throws ConfigurationException,
                                       javax.mail.internet.AddressException
        Checks if mail address is already registered or on hold with a valid link. If not the address is added to onHold.
        Parameters:
        recipient - Mail address of the recipient
        Returns:
        true if mail is added to on hold, false if there's a valid entry for the address
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if mail configuration missing or not complete
        javax.mail.internet.AddressException - if the recipient address is malformed

      • confirmMailaddress

        public static boolean confirmMailaddress(java.lang.String recipient)
                                  throws NotFoundException,
                                         ConfigurationException,
                                         javax.mail.internet.AddressException
        Moves mail address from on hold to confirmed if the verification isn't expired.
        Parameters:
        recipient - Mail address of the recipient
        Returns:
        true if address is confirmed, false if verification expired or address malformed
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if mail is existing in on hold addresses
        ConfigurationException - if mail configuration missing or not complete
        javax.mail.internet.AddressException - if the recipient address is malformed

      • unregisterMailaddress

        public static boolean unregisterMailaddress(java.lang.String recipient)
                                     throws NotFoundException,
                                            javax.mail.internet.AddressException
        Removes mail from confirmed addresses
        Parameters:
        recipient - Mail address of the recipient
        Returns:
        true if recipient is removes, false if not
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if mail is existing in confirmed addresses
        javax.mail.internet.AddressException - if the recipient address is malformed

      • findMailOnHold

        public static AddressOnHold findMailOnHold(java.lang.String recipient)
                                    throws NotFoundException,
                                           ConfigurationException
        Find entry in addresses on hold for the given recipient
        Parameters:
        recipient - Mail address of the recipient
        Returns:
        AddressOnHold object with address and time stamp
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if address not found in on hold
        ConfigurationException - if mail configuration missing or not complete

      • isMailAddressConfirmed

        public static boolean isMailAddressConfirmed(java.lang.String address)
        Checks if given mail address is confirmed
        Parameters:
        address - Mail address of the recipient
        Returns:
        true if address is confirmed, false if not
